data.name: CellContentPresenterNavigationIndex
data.value: This property supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: CellContentPresenterIsSelected
data.value: Gets or sets whether the cell is selected. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterIsReady
data.value: Gets or sets whether a cell's data has been loaded or not. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterIsFocusedCell
data.value: Gets or sets whether the cell is focused. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterHasTopElement
data.value: Indicates whether the cell has an element above it. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterHasRightSibling
data.value: Indicates whether the cell belongs to a column that has a sibling column displayed on its right. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterHasLeftSibling
data.value: Indicates whether the cell belongs to a column that has a sibling column displayed on its left. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterFieldName
data.value: Gets the data source field name of the column which owns the cell.

data.name: CellContentPresenterColumnPosition
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the column that owns the cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterColumn
data.value: Gets or sets a column which owns the cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterBorderState
data.value: Gets the outer margin of the column.

data.name: BaseColumnWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the column's width. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column is displayed within a View. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnView
data.value: Gets the view that owns the column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnName
data.value: Gets or sets the column name.

data.name: BaseColumnMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the column's minimum width. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnHorizontalHeaderContentAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the column header's content alignment. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnHeaderToolTipTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the tooltip's presentation. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnHeaderToolTip

data.name: BaseColumnHeaderTemplateSelector

data.name: BaseColumnHeaderTemplate

data.name: BaseColumnHeaderCaption

data.name: BaseColumnHeader
data.value: Gets or sets the column header's contents. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnFixedWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's width remains the same when the auto column width feature is enabled. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnFixed
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column/band is fixed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnAllowResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can resize this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnActualWidth
data.value: Gets the column's width. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets the column header's width. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets the actual template that defines the tooltip's presentation. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnActualHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a header template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BaseColumnActualAllowResizing
data.value: Gets whether an end-user can resize this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: BandBasePrintBandHeaderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to band headers when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualAllowSorting
data.value: Gets whether an end-user can sort data by the column's values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualAdditionalRowDataWidth
data.value: For internal use only.

data.name: CellContentPresenterShowVerticalLines
data.value: Gets whether a View displays vertical lines. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterShowHorizontalLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal lines are displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterSelectionState
data.value: Gets a value that indicates the cell's selection state. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CellContentPresenterRowData
data.value: Gets or sets the information about a data row which contains the cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualAutoFilterRowCellStyle
data.value: Gets the actual style applied to the column's cell displayed within the Auto Filter Row.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualCellStyle
data.value: Gets the actual style applied to column cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a cell template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualColumnChooserHeaderCaption
data.value: Gets the column's caption when its header is displayed within the Column Band Chooser. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualColumnHeaderContentStyle
data.value: Gets the actual style applied to the column header's contents. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualDataWidth
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualEditSettings
data.value: Gets the actual edit settings used by the grid to create an inplace editor for the column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualHeaderCustomizationAreaTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a template which defines the presentation of the customization area displayed within the column's header based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualPrintCellStyle
data.value: Gets the actual style applied to column cells when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualPrintColumnHeaderStyle
data.value: Gets the actual style applied to the column header's contents when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualPrintTotalSummaryStyle
data.value: Gets the actual style of total summary items displayed within this column, when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualShowValidationAttributeErrors
data.value: Gets whether or not error icons can be displayed within column cells that fail validation specified by the Data Annotations attribute(s). This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseActualTotalSummaryContentStyle
data.value: Gets the actual style of total summary items displayed within this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowAutoFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can filter data by the column's values using the automatic filter row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowBestFit
data.value: Gets or sets whether it's allowed to calculate an optimal width and apply it to the column.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowCellMerge
data.value: Gets or sets whether to enable the Cell Merging feature for the column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowColumnFiltering
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can filter data by column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowEditing
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can edit column values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowFocus
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column can be focused. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowSearchPanel
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column data is taken into account when searching via the Search Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowSorting
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can sort data by the column's values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAllowUnboundExpressionEditor
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can open the Expression Editor for the current unbound column, using a context menu.

data.name: ColumnBaseAutoFilterCondition
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the comparison operator used to create filter conditions for the current column using the Automatic Filter Row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAutoFilterRowCellStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to the column's data cell displayed within the Auto Filter Row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAutoFilterRowDisplayTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template that displays a column's value within the Auto Filter Row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseAutoFilterRowEditTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template that displays a custom editor used to edit a column's value within the Auto Filter Row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseBestFitArea
data.value: Gets or sets which interface elements are taken into account when calculating the column's optimal width.

data.name: ColumnBaseBestFitMaxRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of cells taken into account when calculating the optimal width required for the column to completely display its contents.

data.name: ColumnBaseBestFitMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the optimal width required for this column to completely display its contents, is calculated.

data.name: ColumnBaseBestFitWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the column's width when the Best Fit feature is applied to this column.

data.name: ColumnBaseBinding
data.value: Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.

data.name: ColumnBaseCellStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style of cells displayed within this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseCellTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of column cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a cell template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseColumnChooserHeaderCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the column's caption when its header is displayed within the Column Band Chooser. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseColumnFilterMode
data.value: Gets or sets how column values are filtered. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseColumnFilterPopupMaxRecordsCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of unique column values displayed within the column's filter dropdown. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseColumnHeaderContentStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the column header's style. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseCommands
data.value: Provides access to column commands.

data.name: ColumnBaseCustomColumnFilterPopupTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of the column's Filter Dropdown. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseDisplayTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template that displays column values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseEditSettings
data.value: Gets or sets an object that contains the column editor's settings. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseEditTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template that displays a custom editor used to edit column values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseFieldName
data.value: Gets the name of the database field assigned to this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseFilterEditorHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of the column's header displayed within the Filter Editor. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseFilterPopupMode
data.value: Gets or sets the display mode of the column's filter dropdown. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseHasTotalSummaries
data.value: Gets whether the column displays total summaries. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseHeaderCustomizationAreaTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of the customization area displayed within the column's header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseHeaderCustomizationAreaTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseImmediateUpdateAutoFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's filter condition is updated as soon as an end-user modifies the text within the auto filter row's cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseImmediateUpdateColumnFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's filter condition is updated as soon as an end-user selects an item within the column's Filter Dropdown. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseIsFirst
data.value: Gets whether the column is the first visible column displayed within a View. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseIsLast
data.value: Gets whether the column is the last visible column displayed within a View. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseIsSmart
data.value: Gets or sets whether to enable smart columns generation feature for the column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseIsSorted
data.value: Gets whether data is sorted by the values of this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseIsSortedBySummary
data.value: Gets whether group rows that correspond to this grouping column are sorted by group summary values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseNewItemRowCellStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to the column's data cell displayed within the New Item Row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBasePrintCellStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to column cells when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBasePrintColumnHeaderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to the column's header when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBasePrintTotalSummaryStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style of total summary items displayed within this column, when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseReadOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's values cannot be changed by an end-user. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseRoundDateTimeForColumnFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not the time portion is ignored when filtering by DateTime values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseShowAllTableValuesInCheckedFilterPopup
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter dropdowns display all unique values in the View's data source. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseShowAllTableValuesInFilterPopup
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter dropdowns display all unique values in the View's data source. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseShowEmptyDateFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the date-time column's filter dropdown has a filter item used to select records that contain null values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseShowInColumnChooser
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column's header is displayed within the Column Chooser when the column is hidden. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseShowValidationAttributeErrors
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not error icons are displayed within column cells that fail validation specified by the Data Annotations attribute(s). This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseSortMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the column's data is sorted when sorting is applied to it. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseTabStop
data.value: Gets or sets whether the column can be focused via the TAB key.

data.name: ColumnBaseTotalSummaries
data.value: Gets the list of total summary items displayed within this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseTotalSummaryContentStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style of total summary items displayed within this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseTotalSummaryText
data.value: Gets the text displayed within the summary panel's cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: ColumnBaseUnboundExpression
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate values for this column if it is not bound to a data source field.

data.name: ColumnBaseUnboundType
data.value: Gets or sets the data type and binding mode of the column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataControlBaseAllowColumnMRUFilterList
data.value: Gets or sets whether recently used filter items are displayed in the Filter Dropdowns for columns. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataControlBaseAllowMRUFilterList
data.value: Gets or sets whether the grid's MRU Filter List is enabled. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataControlBaseAutoGenerateColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether columns should be created automatically for all properties in the underlying data source when the View doesn't contain any columns. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets how data is copied to the clipboard.

data.value: Gets or sets the focused column.

data.value: Gets or sets whether sample data rows contain distinct values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataControlBaseEnableSmartColumnsGeneration
data.value: Gets or sets whether to enable smart columns generation feature. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataControlBaseFilterString

data.name: DataControlBaseShowAllTableValuesInCheckedFilterPopup
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter dropdowns display all unique values in the View's data source. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether filter dropdowns display all unique values in the View's data source. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can filter data by column. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to change cell values. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether an editor that did not pass validation can lose focus. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can hide a column by dropping its header outside the column header panel or Group Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to move columns by dragging their headers. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can sort data. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseAutoScrollOnSorting
data.value: Gets or sets whether a View is automatically scrolled after the order of rows has been changed. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether the Summary Panel is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets the length of an animation. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets the collection of resource strings that can be localized at runtime. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseScrollingMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies how many rows are displayed onscreen when a View is scrolled to the bottom. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseScrollStep
data.value: Gets or sets the offset by which the View is scrolled when clicking scrollbar buttons. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchColumns
data.value: Gets or sets the field names against which searches are performed by the Search Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchControl
data.value: Gets or sets the search control. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets the amount of time in milliseconds, after which a data search is initiated (in an automatic find mode). This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the grid displays only those records that match the search criteria. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether or not the search string is cleared when closing the Search Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelCriteriaOperatorType
data.value: Gets or sets the logical operator type (AND or OR).

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelFindFilter
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the comparison operator used to create filter conditions. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelFindMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether data searching starts automatically, or must be started manually. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelHighlightResults
data.value: Gets or sets whether to highlight search results within located records. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelHorizontalAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the Search Panel's alignment. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelImmediateMRUPopup
data.value: Gets or sets whether on not the MRU search dropdown is automatically invoked when typing within the Search box. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchPanelNullText
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within the search panel edit box when the search text is null. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSearchString
data.value: Gets or sets the search string specified within the Search Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowColumnHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether a view displays column headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowFilterPanelMode
data.value: Gets or sets when the Filter Panel is displayed within a View. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowFixedTotalSummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not the Fixed Summary Panel is displayed within the grid. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowFocusedRectangle
data.value: Gets or sets whether a focus rectangle is painted around the focused cell or row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowSearchPanelCloseButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether on not to display the Close button within the Search Panel.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowSearchPanelFindButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether on not to display the Find button within the Search Panel.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowSearchPanelMode
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies when the Search Panel is displayed.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowSearchPanelMRUButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not a button used to invoke the MRU search dropdown list is displayed within the Search Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowTotalSummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Summary Panel is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseShowValidationAttributeErrors
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not error icons are displayed within cells that fail validation specified by the Data Annotations attribute(s). This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseSummariesIgnoreNullValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether null values must be ignored when calculating data summaries. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseTotalSummaryContentStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to total summary items displayed within a View. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseTotalSummaryItemTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of total summary items. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseTotalSummaryItemTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a total summary template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseTouchScrollThreshold
data.value: Specifies the touch scroll threshold. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseUseExtendedMouseScrolling
data.value: Specifies whether to enable horizontal scrolling via the mouse wheel and vertical scrolling via Microsoft Touch Mouse devices. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseValidationError
data.value: Provides access to the object, which contains information about the validation error. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseWaitIndicatorStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the wait indicator's style. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseWaitIndicatorType
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies how async data loading operations are indicated within the grid. This is a dependency property.

data.name: DataViewBaseWheelScrollLines
data.value: Gets or sets the number of rows to scroll vertically in response to mouse wheel events. This is a dependency property.

data.name: EditorEventArgsBaseColumn
data.value: Gets or sets a grid column, for which an event has been raised.

data.name: EditorEventArgsBaseRowHandle
data.value: Gets or sets the row handle, for which an event has been raised.

data.name: EditorEventArgsBaseValue
data.value: Gets the edit value stored in the editor, for which an event has been raised.

data.name: GridCellDataDisplayMemberBindingValue
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GridCellDataIsFocusedCell
data.value: Gets whether the cell is focused. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCellDataIsSelected
data.value: Gets whether the cell is selected.

data.name: GridCellDataRowData
data.value: Gets or sets the information about a data row containing the cell.

data.name: GridCellDataSelectionState
data.value: Gets a value that indicates the cell's selection state. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridColumnCommandsChangeColumnSortOrder
data.value: Toggles a column's sort order.

data.name: GridColumnCommandsClearColumnFilter
data.value: Removes the filter condition applied to a column.

data.name: GridColumnDataView
data.value: Gets the owner view.

data.name: GridColumnDataVisibleIndex
data.value: Gets the column's position among visible columns.

data.name: GridColumnHeaderBaseColumnPosition
data.value: Gets or sets a column's position within a View. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridColumnHeaderBaseHasBottomElement
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GridColumnHeaderBaseHasTopElement
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GridSortInfoFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the field name of the column to sort. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridSortInfoGroupIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the column referred to by the current GridSortInfo object, among grouping columns. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridSortInfoIsGrouped
data.value: Gets whether or not the column which is referred to by the current GridSortInfo object is a grouping column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridSortInfoSortIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the column referred to by the current GridSortInfo object, among sorted columns. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridSortInfoSortOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the column's sort order. This is a dependency property.

data.name: RowDataAlternateRow
data.value: Gets whether the row uses the alternate background.

data.name: RowDataControllerVisibleIndex
data.value: Gets the row's visible position within a View.

data.name: RowDataDataContext
data.value: Gets or sets the row's data context.

data.name: RowDataEvenRow
data.value: Gets whether the row's visible index is even.

data.name: RowDataIsExpanding
data.value: Gets whether a group row is being expanded.

data.name: RowDataIsFocused
data.value: Gets whether the row is focused.

data.name: RowDataIsReady
data.value: Gets whether the row's data has been loaded or not.

data.name: RowDataIsRowExpanded
data.value: Gets whether a group row is expanded.

data.name: RowDataIsRowVisible
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: RowDataIsSelected
data.value: Gets whether the row is selected.

data.name: RowDataLevel
data.value: Gets the row's grouping level.

data.name: RowDataNextRowLevel
data.value: Gets the next row's nesting level.

data.name: RowDataRow
data.value: Gets a row object that corresponds to the row.

data.name: RowDataRowHandle
data.value: Gets the row's handle.

data.name: RowDataRowPosition
data.value: Gets the row's position within a View.

data.name: RowDataRowState
data.value: Gets a row's state.

data.name: RowDataSelectionState
data.value: Gets a value that indicates the row's selection state.

data.name: RowDataShowBottomLine
data.value: Indicates whether the row's bottom line is visible.

data.name: RowHandleValue
data.value: Gets the row's handle.

data.name: SummaryItemBaseAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment within the Fixed Summary Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: SummaryItemBaseDisplayFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the pattern used to format the summary value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: SummaryItemBaseFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of a data source field whose values are used for summary calculation. This is a dependency property.

data.name: SummaryItemBaseShowInColumn
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies a column in whose footer or group rows the summary is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: SummaryItemBaseSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the aggregate function type. This is a dependency property.

data.name: SummaryItemBaseTag
data.value: Gets or sets custom data associated with the summary item. This is a dependency property.

data.name: SummaryItemBaseVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the summary item is displayed within a View. This is a dependency property.
